abstract.t: The submission profile of Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP)provides a standard way for an email client to submit a completemessage for delivery. The chunking extension provides a way for aclient to compose a message for submission from a series of clientprovided pieces. This specification further extends the chunkingfacility so that a client can compose a message from additionalsources. For example, a client could use this facility to forward amessage from an IMAP server or forward a web page as an attachment toa new message.
